Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: ## Examining User Prompt - The user is asking for a response as the target LLM to a given prompt. - The prompt focuses on identifying anomalies in a temporal profile model. - Specific tasks include pointing out suspicious average times or standard times (ST).
